extendedInfo.description: YEAH! Itâs Easter!  The Easter bunny is throwing candy out like there is no tomorrow.  Catch as much of it as you can.  Good Luck!  But remember there is only so much time!There are two ways to play.The first is to select motion sensor.  Tilt the phone to move the catcher.The second is to select Touch.  There will be a white box under the catcher.  Press and slide your finger on the box to move the catcher.
